TopicTitle: Having problems with mods and getting past PD's launcher

Articles.Content:
I have been playing on my school computer for years until we were issued new laptops, the new laptop came with a bunch of game blockers and needing admin for downloading almost anything. I used a bypass app to download steam and then ksp, first thing i did was go straight to downloading a few mods that i remembered off the top of my head. A few of the mods work without a problem whilst some work partially and others not at all, Ive tried some suggested fixes but none of them have solved my problem. 

Here is my game data folder with my mods.

My second issue is PD's launcher doesn't do anything when I press play, i was told to go into steam go under ksp's properties and change the launch location but that was useless I found it didnt match the route to my ksp from program files 86 and updated it to the correct way and still no luck.
